name: .XUM File Extension
summary: Learn about .XUM files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Model file created and used by Excel CAPE-OPEN Unit Operation, a program that allows users to create an Excel workbook for calculating unit operations and use in a CAPE-OPEN simulation environment; stores an .XLS file and metadata for a CAPE-OPEN Excel Unit Operation.

content: In chemical engineering, a unit operation is a basic step in a process that involves physical change or chemical transformation. The Excel CAPE-OPEN Unit Operation is used for calculating these steps.
NOTE: In order to run Excel CAPE-OPEN Unit Operation you must have Microsoft Excel installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
